post.title: Cool Smartphone Bluetooth Software
post.content: I haven’t installed it, buy Mike Tautly has written a Bluetooth Remote Control for SmartPhone. It’s a managed app that uses Bluetooth to communitcate between a remote control app running on the smartphone and a desktop app that can drive other applications. Mike originally built it to drive PowerPoint from his phone. I gotta try this – both my MPx220 SmartPhone and Toshiba Tecra M2 laptop support Bluetooth.
